structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 36, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 1, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 197, effective July 12, 2006; and ch. 168, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/26/2007). 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 3, provides that the amendments to KRS 67.750 in 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 1, "shall apply to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2007."
